"Manon!": "Thank goodness... I've missed you so much."
"Because the previous outfit technically belonged to Resurgent ARKS..."

"The other outfit looked nice,
but I think this one's good too."
"We have so much to catch up on."
"But sorry, I can't. Guren's summoned me to discuss the survey team."

"We wanted to help out with that,
but we were told we couldn't..."
"You each have your own missions, don't you?"
"If so, you should focus on that."
"Manon, will you be alright on your own?"
"Do you not want to be on the Survey team?"
"I've done something totally unforgivable to the people of Halpha..."
"We all still see you as our friend!"
"Even if you do, it doesn't erase the past..."
"How could I ever atone for what I've done..."
"It's all I've been able to think about."
"If something happens, we'll be there for you."
"You don't have to do this alone..."
"You're right... This is a bad habit of mine, isn't it?"
"Guren. Has Manon always been like that lately?"
"It's like she's walled herself off from everything."
"...Well, some people still look at her with skepticism."

"That's awful... Even though Manon still fought
for the good of Halpha..."
"Honestly, I have my own thoughts on the matter."
"...But, I owe you three a debt."

"Let me take care of this.
I won't treat her poorly."
"I hope Manon doesn't have to deal with this on her own..."

"I know Guren said he'd look after Manon,
but we should still check in on her from time to time."
